description:
The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy`s own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Señor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law`s Ultimate Stratagem!
Ikari Bakuhatsu: Luffy Law Saikyou no Hisaku
La colère explose. Luffy et Law, l`ultime stratagème
Дать волю гневу. Секретная тактика Луффи и Ло
怒り爆発 ルフィ・ロー最強の秘策
